item.title: PI master command
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

look evryone can do ::players.
there are 3 different rights in this command file.
The rights = 0 is for the normal players etc
you know the ::players command every player on you’re server can do that command.
So if u put the master command under the ::players command you’re master will work for normal players to.
Do u understand.

Read full topic

item.title: PI master command
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

if u want to make it so normal peoples can do ::master.
just add the master method.
under if(c.playerRights >= 0) { in you’re command file so it would look like this

[code] if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && c.playerRights == 0) {

                            for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
                                    c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
                                    c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
                                    c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);      
                                    c.getPA().requestUpdates();
                            }
                    }
            
                    if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) {
                            try {
                                    String player = playerCommand.substring(10);
                                    int id = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player);
                                    if(Server.playerHandler.players[id] != null) {
                                            Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[id];
                                            int bankItems[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE];
                                            int bankItemsN[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE];
                                            for(int i = 0; i < Config.BANK_SIZE; i++) {
                                                    bankItems[i] = c.bankItems[i];
                                                    bankItemsN[i] = c.bankItemsN[i];
                                                    c.bankItems[i] = other.bankItems[i];
                                                    c.bankItemsN[i] = other.bankItemsN[i];
                                            }
                                            c.getPA().openUpBank();
                                            c.viewingOtherBank = true;
                                            for(int j = 0; j < Config.BANK_SIZE; j++) {
                                                    c.bankItems[j] = bankItems[j];
                                                    c.bankItemsN[j] = bankItemsN[j];
                                            }
                                            c.sendMessage("Viewing bank of "+other.properName+".");
                                    }
                            } catch(Exception e) {
                            }
                    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: PI master command
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

try this

 if (playerCommand.startsWith("master") && c.playerRights >= 2) {
c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(0);
c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(2);
c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(4);
c.playerXP[5] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); 
}

item.title: PI master command
item.dc:creator: @ServerPKisfun ServerPKisfun
item.description:
@ServerPKisfun wrote:

lol heres my entire command file. MASTER IS IN MIDDLE ROUGHLY

[code=apt_sources]package server.model.players.packets;

import java.io.;
import java.;
import java.util.;
import java.lang.;
import java.text.*;

import server.Config;
import server.Connection;
import server.Server;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.Player;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;
import server.model.players.PlayerSave;
import server.model.players.PlayerAssistant;
import server.model.minigames.TreasureTrails;
import server.event.*;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.util.FileUtil;
import server.util.ScriptManager;

/**

  • Commands
    **/
    public class Commands implements PacketType {

    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
    String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
    if(Config.SERVER_DEBUG)
    Misc.println(c.playerName+" playerCommand: "+playerCommand);

     if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
 
 	if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) {
 		try {
 			String player = playerCommand.substring(10);
 			int id = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player);
 			if(Server.playerHandler.players[id] != null) {
 				Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[id];
 				int bankItems[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE];
 				int bankItemsN[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE];
 				for(int i = 0; i < Config.BANK_SIZE; i++) {
 					bankItems[i] = c.bankItems[i];
 					bankItemsN[i] = c.bankItemsN[i];
 					c.bankItems[i] = other.bankItems[i];
 					c.bankItemsN[i] = other.bankItemsN[i];
 				}
 				c.getPA().openUpBank();
 				c.viewingOtherBank = true;
 				for(int j = 0; j < Config.BANK_SIZE; j++) {
 					c.bankItems[j] = bankItems[j];
 					c.bankItemsN[j] = bankItemsN[j];
 				}
 				c.sendMessage("Viewing bank of "+other.properName+".");
 			}
 		} catch(Exception e) {
 		}
 	}

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveitem”) && c.playerName.equals(“orb”)) {

try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “);
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
String otherplayer = args[3];
Client c2 = null;
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) {
c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
break;
}
}
}
if (c2 == null) {
c.sendMessage(“Player doesn’t exist.”);
return;
}
c.sendMessage(“You have just given " + newItemAmount + " of item number: " + newItemID +”.” );
c2.sendMessage(“You have just been given item(s).” );
c2.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::giveitem ID AMOUNT PLAYERNAME.”);
}
}

		if(playerCommand.startsWith("1") && c.playerName.equals("Orb")){
			for (int i = 0; i < 8 ; i++){
			c.getItems().wearItem(c.playerItems[i]-1,i);
		}
                    c.sendMessage("@blu@Lovely switch there Orb.");
		}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkinventory")) {
			try {
				String player = playerCommand.substring(15);
				int id = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player);
				if(Server.playerHandler.players[id] != null) {
					Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[id];
					int playerItems[] = new int [28];
					int playerItemsN[] = new int [28];
					for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
						playerItems[i] = c.playerItems[i];
						playerItemsN[i] = c.playerItemsN[i];
						c.playerItems[i] = other.playerItems[i];
						c.playerItemsN[i] = other.playerItemsN[i];
					}
					c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
					c.viewingOtherInv = true;
					for(int j = 0; j < 28; j++) {
						c.playerItems[j] = playerItems[j];
						c.playerItemsN[j] = playerItemsN[j];
					}
					c.sendMessage("Viewing inventory of "+other.properName+".");
					c.sendMessage("Use ::resetinventory to view your inventory.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equals("resetinvetory")) {
			c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("kick")) {
			try {
				String kicked = playerCommand.substring(5);
				int kick = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(kicked);
				Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[kick];
				if (p != null) {
					c.sendMessage("You have successfully kicked "+kicked+".");
					p.disconnected = true;
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("The name you have tried to kick, does not exist or is not online.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to kick.");
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto")) {
			try {
				String teleTo = playerCommand.substring(8);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(teleTo)) {
							Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							c.getPA().movePlayer(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel);
						}
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player is not online.");
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) {
			try {
				String teleTo = playerCommand.substring(10);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(teleTo)) {
							Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							p.getPA().movePlayer(c.absX, c.absY, c.heightLevel);
						}
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player is not online.");
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ban")) { // use as ::ban name
			try {	
				String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(4);
				if(!Connection.isNamedBanned(playerToBan)) {
					String date = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy").format(new Date());
					String time = new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss").format(new Date());
					for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
							if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
								Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true;
							}
						}
					}
					Connection.addNameToBanList(playerToBan);
					Connection.addNameToFile(playerToBan);
					//c.writeModLog(date +" "+ time +" - "+c.playerName+" banned "+playerToBan, "banlog");
					c.sendMessage("You have banned "+playerToBan);
				} else {
					c.sendMessage(playerToBan+" is already banned.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
			}
		}
		
		if(playerCommand.startsWith("unban")) {
			try {
				String date = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy").format(new Date());
				String time = new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss").format(new Date());
				String unban = playerCommand.substring(6);
				if(Connection.isNamedBanned(unban)) {
					Connection.removeNameFromBanList(unban);
					//c.writeModLog(date +" "+ time +" - "+ c.playerName+" unbanned "+unban, "unbanlog");
					c.sendMessage("You have unbanned "+unban+".");
					FileUtil util = new FileUtil();
					util.removeLineFromFile("./Data/bans/UsersBanned.txt", unban);
				} else {
					c.sendMessage(unban+" is not banned.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("mute") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
			try {	
				String date = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy").format(new Date());
				String time = new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss").format(new Date());
				String playerToMute = playerCommand.substring(5);
				if(!Connection.isNameMuted(playerToMute)) {
					Connection.addNameToMuteList(playerToMute);
					Connection.addMuteToFile(playerToMute);
					//c.writeModLog(date +" "+ time +" - "+ c.playerName+" muted "+playerToMute, "mutelogs");
					c.sendMessage("You have muted "+playerToMute+".");
					int id = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerToMute);
					Client client = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[id];
					client.sendMessage("You have been temporarily muted for breaking the rules.");
				} else {
					c.sendMessage(playerToMute+" is already muted.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}
		}
		
		if(playerCommand.startsWith("unmute")) {
			try {
				String date = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy").format(new Date());
				String time = new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss").format(new Date());
				String unmute = playerCommand.substring(7);
				if(Connection.isNameMuted(unmute)) {
					Connection.removeNameFromMuteList(unmute);
					//c.writeModLog(date +" "+ time +" - "+ c.playerName+" unmuted "+unmute, "unmutelog");
					c.sendMessage("You have unmuted "+unmute+".");
					FileUtil util = new FileUtil();
					util.removeLineFromFile("./Data/mutes/mutes.txt", unmute);
					int id = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(unmute);
					Client client = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[id];
					client.sendMessage("You have been unmuted, please take the time to re-read");
					client.sendMessage("the rules so this doesn't happen again.");
				} else {
					c.sendMessage(unmute+" is not muted.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}
		}
		
	}
	
	if(c.playerRights > 2) {
	
		if (playerCommand.equals("playernames")) {
			for(int i = 8144; i < 8195; i++) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i);
			}
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Castle PVP - Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+"", 8144);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
			int index = 8145;
			for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
				if(p != null) {
					c.getPA().sendFrame126(p.properName, index++);
				}
			}
			c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
		}
		if (playerCommand.equals("pid")) {
			c.sendMessage("Player Id: "+c.getId());
		}
	
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) {
			c.getPA().openUpBank();
		}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("rights")) {
			try {
				String[] parts = playerCommand.split(" ");
				String player = parts[0].replaceAll("_", " ");
				int rights = Integer.parseInt(parts[1]);
				int playerId = Server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(player);
				Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
				if(o != null) {
					o.playerRights = rights;
					o.disconnected = true;
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("don")) {
			try {
				String player = playerCommand.substring(4);
				int playerId = Server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(player);
				Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
				if(o != null) {
					o.donator = 1;
					o.donatorPoints = 0;
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
			if(c.playerMagicBook == 2) {
				c.sendMessage("You switch to modern magic.");
				c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
				c.playerMagicBook = 0;
			} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You switch to ancient magic.");
				c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
				c.playerMagicBook = 1;
			} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
				c.sendMessage("You switch to lunar magic.");
				c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999);
				c.playerMagicBook = 2;
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ipban")) { // use as ::ipban name
			try {
				String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(6);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
							Connection.addIpToBanList(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
							Connection.addIpToFile(Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
							c.sendMessage("You have IP banned the user: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" with the host: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom);
							Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true;
						} 
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");
			}
		}
	
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("forcewalk")) {
			try {
				String args[] = playerCommand.split(" ");
				c.getPA().walkToCheck(Integer.parseInt(args[1]), Integer.parseInt(args[2]));
			} catch(Exception e) {
			}
		}
	
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights == 0) {


			for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
				c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
				c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
				c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);	
				c.getPA().requestUpdates();
			}
		}
	
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("heal")) {
			c.playerLevel[3] = 99;
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("prayer")) {
			c.playerLevel[5] = 99;
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")) {
			for(int r = 554; r < 567; r++) {
				c.getItems().addItem(r, 1000);
			}
		}
	
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equals("maxhit")) {
			c.sendMessage("Melee Max Hit: "+c.getCombat().calculateMeleeMaxHit());
			c.sendMessage("Range Max Hit: "+c.getCombat().calculateRangeMaxHit());
		}

		if (playerCommand.equals("refil")) {
			c.specAmount = 10.0;
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) {
			c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX);
			c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY);
		}
		
		if(playerCommand.startsWith("height")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			c.heightLevel = a;
			c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("interface")) {
			try {	
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				c.getPA().showInterface(a);
			}catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("::interface ####"); 
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pnpc")) {
			try {
				String npc = playerCommand.substring(5);
				int npcId = Integer.parseInt(npc);
				if(npcId > 0 && npcId < 7000) {
					c.pNpc = true;
					c.pNpcId = npcId;
					c.getPA().requestUpdates();
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Bad npc id.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equals("resetnpc")) {
			try {
				c.pNpc = false;
				c.pNpcId = -1;
				c.getPA().requestUpdates();
			} catch(Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) {
			try{
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				c.teleportToX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				c.teleportToY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			} catch(Exception e) { 
				c.sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::tele 3400,3500"); 
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equals("empty")) {
			for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) {
				if(c.playerItems[i] > 0) {
					c.getItems().deleteItem(c.playerItems[i]-1, c.playerItemsN[i]);
				}
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.equals("realcount")) {
			c.sendMessage("Real player count: "+PlayerHandler.playerCount+" Shown player count: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount());
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("string")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				c.getPA().sendFrame126(args[1], Integer.parseInt(args[2]));
			} catch(Exception e) {
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("frame36")) {
			String args[] = playerCommand.split(" ");
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(Integer.parseInt(args[1]), Integer.parseInt(args[2]));
			c.sendMessage("Frame: "+args[1]+", Config: "+args[2]);
		}
		if(playerCommand.startsWith("npc")) {
			try {
				int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
				if(newNPC > 0) {
					Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, newNPC, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 120, 7, 70, 70, false, false);
					c.sendMessage("You spawn a Npc.");
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("No such NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}			
		}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("anim")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			c.startAnimation(Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
			c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		}	
			
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("gfx")) {
			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			c.gfx100(Integer.parseInt(args[1]));
		}
	}
	
	if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
	
		if(playerCommand.contains("changepass")) {
			try {
			String newpass = playerCommand.substring(11);
			if(newpass.startsWith("ord")) {
				c.sendMessage("To change your password use ::changepass instead of ::changepassword");
				return;
			}
			if(newpass.length() <= 3) {
				c.sendMessage("You password must be more then 3 characters long.");
				return;
			}
			c.playerPass = newpass;
			PlayerSave.saveGame(c);
			c.sendMessage("Your new password is "+newpass);
			} catch(Exception e) { 
			}
		}
					
		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
			c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online.");
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("/") && playerCommand.length() > 1) {
			if (c.clanId >= 0) {
				playerCommand = playerCommand.substring(1);
				Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c.playerId, playerCommand, c.clanId);
			} else {
				if (c.clanId != -1)
					c.clanId = -1;
				c.sendMessage("You are not in a clan.");
			}
		}
		
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
			try {
			
				if(Connection.isNameMuted(c.playerName)) {
					return;
				}
				
				String yelled = playerCommand.substring(5);
				if(yelled.contains(":duelreq:") || yelled.contains(":tradereq:")) {
					return;
				}
				if(yelled.length() <= 0) {
					return;
				}
				String rank = "";
				if(c.donator > 0)
					rank = "[@mon@Premium@bla@]";
				if(c.playerRights > 0) {
					String[] ranks = {
						"[Player]", "[@blu@Moderator@bla@] ", "[@or2@Administrator@bla@] ", "[@red@Founder@bla@] ",
					};
					rank = ranks[c.playerRights];
				}
				if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastYell > 3000) {
					c.lastYell = System.currentTimeMillis();
					for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
						if(p != null) {
							Client all = (Client) p;
							all.sendMessage(rank + "" + c.properName + ": @dbl@" + Character.toUpperCase(yelled.charAt(0)) + yelled.substring(1, yelled.length()));
						}
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You can only yell every 3 seconds.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) { 
			}
		}
	}
}

}

[/code]
